title: Bank Robbery - Downtown Branch
description: Armed robbery at First National Bank. Three masked suspects. Demand note passed to teller. Escaped with approximately $85,000.

location.address: 100 Financial Plaza, First National Bank, Metropolis

persons.name: Unknown Suspect 1
persons.description: Male, approximately 6'2, muscular build. Wore black ski mask and carried shotgun. Appeared to be leader.

persons.name: Unknown Suspect 2
persons.description: Male, approximately 5'8, slim build. Wore blue bandana. Controlled crowd.

persons.name: Unknown Suspect 3
persons.description: Male or female, approximately 5'6. Wore hoodie and surgical mask. Collected money.

persons.name: Patricia Gomez
persons.statement: The tall one did all the talking. Had a deep voice. Said 'nobody move' several times. Very calm.

persons.name: Kevin O'Brien
persons.statement: I was in line. They were in and out in under 4 minutes. Very organized. Left in a dark blue van.

persons.name: Sandra Lee
persons.statement: I'm the teller. He slid me a note. Demanded hundreds and fifties only. Knew exactly what to ask for.

evidence.description: Dye pack fragments found 2 blocks away
Traffic camera footage of escape route
